name: Jiangshi
description: The Jiangshi is a Medium undead creature known for its physical durability and fear-inducing presence. It possesses strong claw attacks and the ability to drain life from its enemies.
memorable: Can instill fear in enemies and drain life, turning defeated foes into Jiangshi.
goals: To dominate its surroundings and weaken opponents through fear and life drain.
relations: Often associated with other undead creatures or malevolent spirits.
environment: Typically found in haunted or cursed locations.
strengths: Strong melee capabilities and the ability to instill fear.
weaknesses: Vulnerable to fire damage and has a low speed.
attacks: Multiattack with two claw strikes or life-draining capability.
most_powerful_ability: Life Drain attack can reduce a target's maximum hit points and turn them into another Jiangshi if they die.
senses: Possesses blindsight up to 60 feet, allowing it to detect foes without sight.
skills: Has notable skills in athletics and perception, aiding in physical tasks and detecting enemies.
additional_information: Immune to poison damage and conditions like blindness and exhaustion.
Can jump significant distances with Standing Leap ability.
Keen Hearing grants it advantage on auditory perception checks.
Grappling ability enables it to restrain opponents easily.
Terrifying Appearance can frighten opponents within close range.
test_queries: monster that turns foes into undead
